snippet: In back-to-back shows on Friday, New York designers began to make a case for what separates American men's wear from the fashion we've just seen in the Milan and Paris collections.
abstract: In back-to-back shows on Friday, New York designers began to make a case for what separates American men's wear from the fashion we've just seen in the Milan and Paris collections.
lead_paragraph: In back-to-back shows on Friday, New York designers began to make a case for what separates American men's wear from the fashion we've just seen in the Milan and Paris collections.

headline.main: In Men's Wear, a Separation of Europe and the States
